Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
Funding for the study of Viral Respiratory Pathogens Genetics was provided from the NIAID NO1-AI-030039. The datasets used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap/XXXXX through dbGaP study accession numbers xxxxx. Data from the Viral Respiratory Pathogens Genetics Project were provided by Robert Couch, MD on behalf of his collaborators at Baylor College of Medicine. Dr. Robert Couch and his collaborators request that publications resulting from these data cite their original publications: Host Transcriptional Response to Influenza and Other Acute Respiratory Viral Infections--A Prospective Cohort Study. Zhai Y, Franco LM, Atmar RL, Quarles JM, Arden N, Bucasas KL, Wells JM, Niño D, Wang X, Zapata GE, Shaw CA, Belmont JW, Couch RB. PLoS Pathog. 2015 Jun 12;11(6):e1004869. PMID: 26070066
Integrative genomic analysis of the human immune response to influenza vaccination. Franco LM, Bucasas KL, Wells JM, Niño D, Wang X, Zapata GE, Arden N, Renwick A, Yu P, Quarles JM, Bray MS, Couch RB, Belmont JW, Shaw CA. Elife. 2013 Jul 16;2:e00299. doi: 10.7554/eLife.00299. PMID: 23878721

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
